title: Ken Follett -- Fall of Giants (Book 1 of the Century Trilogy)

Book Description
Publication Date: September 4, 2012 | Series: Century Trilogy (Book 1)
Ken FollettÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s magnificent new historical epic begins, as five interrelated families move through the momentous dramas of the First World War, the Russian Revolution, and the struggle for womenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s suffrage.

A thirteen-year-old Welsh boy enters a manÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s world in the mining pits.Ã¢â‚¬Â¦An American law student rejected in love finds a surprising new career in Woodrow WilsonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s White House.Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ A housekeeper for the aristocratic Fitzherberts takes a fateful step above her station, while Lady Maud Fitzherbert herself crosses deep into forbidden territory when she falls in love with a German spy.Ã¢â‚¬Â¦And two orphaned Russian brothers embark on radically different paths when their plan to emigrate to America falls afoul of war, conscription, and revolution.

From the dirt and danger of a coal mine to the glittering chandeliers of a palace, from the corridors of power to the bedrooms of the mighty, Fall of Giants takes us into the inextricably entangled fates of five familiesÃ¢â‚¬â€and into a century that we thought we knew, but that now will never seem the same again.Ã¢â‚¬Â¦
